item.title: Make Toolchains with Docker
item.description: Task Requirement We need a centos5 container with following packages: gcc44 and g++44 that can build both 64 and 32 bit app python2.7 with PyYAML module perl 5.8+ Tips The latest open-ssl (e.g. v1.1.1 at write time) is not supported by old distro (e.g. centos5), so it is wise to download (src) modules into the working folder before running docker build instead of doing so in Dockerfile if openssl is used (e.
